verses.verse: The book <S%G976><s%> of the genealogy <S%G1078><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of David, <S%G1138><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Abraham. <S%G11><s%>

Abraham <S%G11><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Isaac. <S%G2464><s%> Isaac <S%G2464><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Jacob. <S%G2384><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Judah <S%G2455><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brothers. <S%G80><s%>

Judah <S%G2455><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> Perez <S%G5329><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Zerah <S%G1537><s%> by Tamar. <S%G2283><s%> Perez <S%G5329><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Hezron. <S%G2074><s%> Hezron <S%G2074><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Ram. <S%G689><s%>

Ram <S%G689><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Amminadab. <S%G284><s%> Amminadab <S%G284><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Nahshon. <S%G3476><s%> Nahshon <S%G3476><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Salmon. <S%G4533><s%>

Salmon <S%G4533><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> Boaz <S%G1003><s%> by Rahab. <S%G4477><s%> Boaz <S%G1003><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> Obed <S%G5601><s%> by Ruth. <S%G4503><s%> Obed <S%G5601><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Jesse. <S%G2421><s%>

Jesse <S%G2421><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of King <S%G935><s%> David. <S%G1138><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> Solomon <S%G4672><s%> by her <S%G3588><s%> who had been the wife of Uriah. <S%G3774><s%>

Solomon <S%G4672><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Rehoboam. <S%G4497><s%> Rehoboam <S%G4497><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Abijah. <S%G7><s%> Abijah <S%G7><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Asa. <S%G760><s%>

Asa <S%G760><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Jehoshaphat. <S%G2498><s%> Jehoshaphat <S%G2498><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Joram. <S%G2496><s%> Joram <S%G2496><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Uzziah. <S%G3604><s%>

Uzziah <S%G3604><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Jotham. <S%G2488><s%> Jotham <S%G1161><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Ahaz. <S%G881><s%> Ahaz <S%G881><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Hezekiah. <S%G1478><s%>

Hezekiah <S%G1478><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Manasseh. <S%G3128><s%> Manasseh <S%G3128><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Amon. <S%G300><s%> Amon <S%G300><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Josiah. <S%G2502><s%>

Josiah <S%G2502><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Jechoniah <S%G2423><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his brothers, <S%G80><s%> at the time <S%G1909><s%> of the <S%G846><s%> exile to <S%G3350><s%> Babylon. <S%G897><s%>

After <S%G3326><s%> the exile to <S%G3350><s%> Babylon, <S%G897><s%> Jechoniah <S%G2423><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Shealtiel. <S%G4528><s%> Shealtiel <S%G4528><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Zerubbabel. <S%G2216><s%>

Zerubbabel <S%G2216><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Abiud. <S%G10><s%> Abiud <S%G10><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Eliakim. <S%G1662><s%> Eliakim <S%G1662><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Azor. <S%G107><s%>

Azor <S%G107><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Sadoc. <S%G4524><s%> Sadoc <S%G4524><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Achim. <S%G885><s%> Achim <S%G885><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Eliud. <S%G1664><s%>

Eliud <S%G1664><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Eleazar. <S%G1648><s%> Eleazar <S%G1648><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Matthan. <S%G3157><s%> Matthan <S%G3157><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Jacob. <S%G2384><s%>

Jacob <S%G2384><s%> became the father <S%G1080><s%> of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> from whom <S%G3739><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> who is called <S%G3004><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the generations <S%G1074><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> to <S%G2193><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> are fourteen <S%G1180><s%> generations; <S%G1074><s%> from <S%G575><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> to <S%G2193><s%> the exile to <S%G3350><s%> Babylon <S%G897><s%> fourteen <S%G1180><s%> generations; <S%G1074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the carrying away to <S%G3350><s%> Babylon <S%G897><s%> to <S%G2193><s%> the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> fourteen <S%G1180><s%> generations. <S%G1074><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the birth <S%G1083><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> like this; <S%G3779><s%> for after <S%G1063><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> was engaged <S%G1064><s%> to Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> before <S%G4250><s%> they <S%G846><s%> came together, <S%G4905><s%> she was <S%G2192><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> pregnant by the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> her <S%G846><s%> husband, <S%G435><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> a righteous <S%G1342><s%> man, <S%G2532><s%> and not <S%G3361><s%> willing <S%G2309><s%> to make <S%G3856><s%> her <S%G846><s%> a public example, <S%G3856><s%> intended <S%G1014><s%> to put <S%G630><s%> her <S%G846><s%> away <S%G630><s%> secretly. <S%G2977><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G1760><s%> he <S%G846><s%> thought about <S%G1760><s%> these things, <S%G5023><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> appeared <S%G5316><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> a dream, <S%G3677><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> of David, <S%G1138><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> be afraid <S%G5399><s%> to take to yourself <S%G3880><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> for that <S%G1063><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is conceived <S%G1080><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> her <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

She <S%G1161><s%> shall bring forth <S%G5088><s%> a son. <S%G5207><s%> You <S%G2532><s%> shall call <S%G2564><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> it is he <S%G846><s%> who shall save <S%G4982><s%> his <S%G846><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> from <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sins. <S%G266><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> has happened, <S%G1096><s%> that it <S%G2443><s%> might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G4483><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

"Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the virgin <S%G3933><s%> shall be <S%G2192><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> child, <S%G1064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall bring forth <S%G5088><s%> a son. <S%G5207><s%> They <S%G2532><s%> shall call <S%G2564><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> Immanuel; <S%G1694><s%>" which <S%G3739><s%> is, <S%G2076><s%> being interpreted, <S%G3177><s%> "God <S%G2316><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> us. <S%G2257><s%>"

Joseph <S%G2501><s%> arose <S%G1326><s%> from <S%G575><s%> his sleep, <S%G5258><s%> and did <S%G4160><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> commanded <S%G4367><s%> him, <S%G3880><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> took his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> to himself; <S%G3880><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> her <S%G846><s%> sexually until she had brought forth <S%G5088><s%> her <S%G846><s%> firstborn <S%G4416><s%> son. <S%G5207><s%> He named <S%G3686><s%> him <S%G2564><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
